snippet: Prime Minister Paolo Gentiloni won the support of both houses this week, but political debate has danced around one question: How long will it last?...
abstract: Former Italian Foreign Min Paolo Gentiloni wins support of both chambers of Parliament in confidence votes, allowing him to succeed Prime Min Matteo Renzi.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Paolo Gentiloni won the support of both houses this week, but political debate has danced around one question: How long will it last?

headline.main: Italian Parliament Approves New Government, for Now
headline.print_headline: Italy’s Parliament Backs New Government, for Now
